paragraph: Andreas Mjøs (born 1 March 1976 in Tønsberg, Norway) is a Norwegian musician, record producer and composer, known from a series of performances and albums within Jaga Jazzist. He is also on a number of other album releases both as performer and producer.

Within «Rotoscope» including Jørgen Træen, Knut Aalefjær, Rune Brøndbo, Lars Horntveth, Rob Waring & Christine Sandtorv2001: Great Curves (Jester), feat. Hild Sofie Tafjord & Marius Reksjø (also as composer & producer)
